seo.title: Monterosso Agriturismi 2025 | Farm Stays in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Discover authentic agriturismi near Monterosso. Farm stays in the hills with local wine, olive oil, and traditional Ligurian hospitality.

body.title: Agriturismi near Monterosso
body.subtitle: Experience authentic farm life in the Cinque Terre hills. Local wine, olive oil production, and traditional Ligurian cuisine in peaceful rural settings.

features.title: Wine Production
features.description: Stay at working vineyards. Learn about Cinque Terre DOC wine production.

features.title: Olive Oil Tastings
features.description: Sample freshly pressed olive oil from century-old groves.

features.title: Rustic Comfort
features.description: Restored farmhouses with modern amenities and stunning views.

features.title: Farm-to-Table
features.description: Meals prepared with vegetables and herbs from the property.

features.title: Hillside Location
features.description: Peaceful settings above the coast with hiking trail access.

features.title: Panoramic Views
features.description: Terraced vineyards overlooking the Mediterranean Sea.
